name: Nicole & the Stupid Sirens
description:
in this non-canonical tale, nicole and her friends are playing pirates & set out on a high sea's adventure! then disaster strikes! sirens board their ship and kidnaps all of her friends! just how will nicole get through this one?

I made this game to finally start putting my OC's out there... and as a test as to how well i could put something together in rpg maker

a minor autosave bug:  autosave is meant to kick in every once in a while, but it doesn't seem to work. Not a big deal since you're already able to save whenever you want (plus, the game is only 10-20 min long anyways).
